General.Name: Cheryong Electric Co.Ltd
General.Description: Cheryong Electric Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells power electric equipment in South Korea. It offers amorphous, oil immersed, cast resin, PAD mounted, pole mounted, solid insulation distribution, and submersible transformers; gas insulated switchgears; and polymer lightning arresters and hybrid cutout switches. The company was formerly known as Cheryong Industrial and changed its name to Cheryong Electric Co.,Ltd. in November 2011. Cheryong Electric Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
